name: P-cman's BLOODY Revenge (Prototype)
description:
The evil ghosts captured ms. P-cman! Only mr. P-cman can rescue her! Take the shotgun and go to rescue!

___

This prototype of my little fan-made game about Pacman that i made in 5 days.

___

I use resources from "Pacman Revenge" by Idem Soft (I think this bootleg game for ZX Spectrum). Anyway, Pacman and other characters belong to BANDAI NAMCO
